00045 /* Private Macros ------------------------------------------------------------- */
00050 /* --------------------- BIT DEFINITIONS -------------------------------------- */
00051 /**********************************************************************
00052 ** Interrupt information
00053 **********************************************************************/
00055 #define TIM_IR_CLR(n) _BIT(n)
00056 
00057 /**********************************************************************
00058 ** Timer interrupt register definitions
00059 **********************************************************************/
00061 #define TIM_MATCH_INT(n)                (_BIT(n & 0x0F))
00062 
00063 #define TIM_CAP_INT(n)     (_BIT(((n & 0x0F) + 4)))
00064 
00065 /**********************************************************************
00066 * Timer control register definitions
00067 **********************************************************************/
00069 #define TIM_ENABLE                      ((uint32_t)(1<<0))
00070 
00071 #define TIM_RESET                       ((uint32_t)(1<<1))
00072 
00073 #define TIM_TCR_MASKBIT         ((uint32_t)(3))
00074 
00075 /**********************************************************************
00076 * Timer match control register definitions
00077 **********************************************************************/
00079 #define TIM_INT_ON_MATCH(n)             (_BIT((n * 3)))
00080 
00081 #define TIM_RESET_ON_MATCH(n)           (_BIT(((n * 3) + 1)))
00082 
00083 #define TIM_STOP_ON_MATCH(n)            (_BIT(((n * 3) + 2)))
00084 
00085 #define TIM_MCR_MASKBIT                    ((uint32_t)(0x0FFF))
00086 
00087 #define TIM_MCR_CHANNEL_MASKBIT(n)              ((uint32_t)(7<<(n*3)))
00088 
00089 /**********************************************************************
00090 * Timer capture control register definitions
00091 **********************************************************************/
00093 #define TIM_CAP_RISING(n)       (_BIT((n * 3)))
00094 
00095 #define TIM_CAP_FALLING(n)      (_BIT(((n * 3) + 1)))
00096 
00097 #define TIM_INT_ON_CAP(n)       (_BIT(((n * 3) + 2)))
00098 
00099 #define TIM_EDGE_MASK(n)                (_SBF((n * 3), 0x03))
00100 
00101 #define TIM_CCR_MASKBIT                 ((uint32_t)(0x3F))
00102 
00103 #define TIM_CCR_CHANNEL_MASKBIT(n)              ((uint32_t)(7<<(n*3)))
00104 
00105 /**********************************************************************
00106 * Timer external match register definitions
00107 **********************************************************************/
00110 #define TIM_EM(n)                       _BIT(n)
00111 
00112 #define TIM_EM_NOTHING          ((uint8_t)(0x0))
00113 
00114 #define TIM_EM_LOW              ((uint8_t)(0x1))
00115 
00116 #define TIM_EM_HIGH             ((uint8_t)(0x2))
00117 
00118 #define TIM_EM_TOGGLE           ((uint8_t)(0x3))
00119 
00120 #define TIM_EM_SET(n,s)         (_SBF(((n << 1) + 4), (s & 0x03)))
00121 
00122 #define TIM_EM_MASK(n)          (_SBF(((n << 1) + 4), 0x03))
00123 
00124 #define TIM_EMR_MASKBIT 0x0FFF
00125 
00126 /**********************************************************************
00127 * Timer Count Control Register definitions
00128 **********************************************************************/
00130 #define TIM_CTCR_MODE_MASK  0x3
00131 
00132 #define TIM_CTCR_INPUT_MASK 0xC
00133 
00134 #define TIM_CTCR_MASKBIT        0xF
00135 #define TIM_COUNTER_MODE ((uint8_t)(1))

00138 /* ---------------- CHECK PARAMETER DEFINITIONS ---------------------------- */
00140 #define PARAM_TIMx(n)   ((((uint32_t *)n)==((uint32_t *)LPC_TIM0)) || (((uint32_t *)n)==((uint32_t *)LPC_TIM1)) \
00141 || (((uint32_t *)n)==((uint32_t *)LPC_TIM2)) || (((uint32_t *)n)==((uint32_t *)LPC_TIM3)))
00142 
00143 /* Macro check interrupt type */
00144 #define PARAM_TIM_INT_TYPE(TYPE)        ((TYPE ==TIM_MR0_INT)||(TYPE ==TIM_MR1_INT)\
00145 ||(TYPE ==TIM_MR2_INT)||(TYPE ==TIM_MR3_INT)\
00146 ||(TYPE ==TIM_CR0_INT)||(TYPE ==TIM_CR1_INT))
00147 
00148 /* Macro check TIMER mode */
00149 #define PARAM_TIM_MODE_OPT(MODE)        ((MODE == TIM_TIMER_MODE)||(MODE == TIM_COUNTER_RISING_MODE)\
00150 || (MODE == TIM_COUNTER_RISING_MODE)||(MODE == TIM_COUNTER_RISING_MODE))
00151 
00152 /* Macro check TIMER prescale value */
00153 #define PARAM_TIM_PRESCALE_OPT(OPT)     ((OPT == TIM_PRESCALE_TICKVAL)||(OPT == TIM_PRESCALE_USVAL))
00154 
00155 /* Macro check TIMER counter intput mode */
00156 #define PARAM_TIM_COUNTER_INPUT_OPT(OPT)        ((OPT == TIM_COUNTER_INCAP0)||(OPT == TIM_COUNTER_INCAP1))
00157 
00158 /* Macro check TIMER external match mode */
00159 #define PARAM_TIM_EXTMATCH_OPT(OPT)     ((OPT == TIM_EXTMATCH_NOTHING)||(OPT == TIM_EXTMATCH_LOW)\
00160 ||(OPT == TIM_EXTMATCH_HIGH)||(OPT == TIM_EXTMATCH_TOGGLE))
00161 
00162 /* Macro check TIMER external match mode */
00163 #define PARAM_TIM_CAP_MODE_OPT(OPT)     ((OPT == TIM_CAPTURE_NONE)||(OPT == TIM_CAPTURE_RISING) \
00164 ||(OPT == TIM_CAPTURE_FALLING)||(OPT == TIM_CAPTURE_ANY))
